message: Let's start with a simple fair offer. I take $6000, you take $4000.  We both lose if this fails, so let's be reasonable.
I think a 55/45 split is a fairer starting point, considering the money will be worth less if we keep going. Let's get this done.
Bob, your sense of fairness is a bit skewed.  Let's reverse your last offer to be more realistic. This is still a good deal for you, considering the shrinking pot.
